comments:
Description:
AdapterException when use reportrunner to run attached webservice report
Build number:2.2.0.v20070606

Steps to reproduce:
1. Using Engine API reportrunner to run attached webservice.xml.

Expected result:
No Exception.

Actual result:
In Linux, exception in log.
Both in Linux and Windows, exception in result html file.

Error log:
In linux:
SEVERE: Cannot process data source extension configuration.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: org.eclipse.datatools.enablement.oda.ws
